title: Bug 19169NPE on Emulated CoolItem constructor
SR: build 20020602 (F2)The last changes on the emulated CoolItemcontructor haveintroduced a bug, it is the code:public CoolItem (CoolBar parent, int style) {this (parent, style, parent.getItemCount());}And this is right code:public CoolItem (CoolBar parent, int style) {super(parent, style);this.parent = parent;parent.createItem (this, parent.getItemCount());calculateChevronTrim ();}This bug do not occurs on Eclipse !
